titleStmt.title: The Catholick gamesters, or, A dubble match of bowleing with an account of a sharp conference held on the eve of St. Jago between His Holiness and the Mahometan dons in St. Katherines Bastile ... : to the tune of The plot in the meal-tub, or, Tan-ta-ra-ra-ra make shift / published by a by-stander to prevent false reports.
titleStmt.author: By-stander.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at the half-way house that stood between Bothwel-Bridge and Holy Road-House,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.

place.placeName: the half-way house that stood between Bothwel-Bridge
